value.title: Heathrow Airport Deploys Anti-Virus Robots And Testing To Skip U.K. Quarantine
value.excerpt: London's Heathrow Airport is doing everything in its power to encourage travelers back to the skies. The airport has faced a bleak few months with the number of passengers in June down 95% from the previous year.

value.title: Google launches hieroglyphics translator powered by AI
value.excerpt: Google has launched a hieroglyphics translator that uses machine learning to decode ancient Egyptian language. The feature has been added to its Arts & Culture app. It also allows users to translate their own words and emojis into shareable hieroglyphs.

value.title: Japanese robot to clock in at a convenience store in test of retail automation
value.excerpt: In August, a robot vaguely resembling a kangaroo will begin stacking sandwiches, drinks and ready meals on shelves at a Japanese convenience store in a test its maker, Telexistence, hopes will help trigger a wave of retail automation.
